程序包 org.texttechnology.parliament_browser_6_4.helper

类 MongoDBConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,​V>

          • org.texttechnology.parliament_browser_6_4.helper.MongoDBConfig
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,​java.lang.Object>
    public class MongoDBConfig
extends java.util.Properties
    A class that extends Properties to manage MongoDB configuration. This class allows loading MongoDB configuration parameters such as hostname, username, password, port, database name, and collection name from a properties file.
    作者:
    Giuseppe Abrami
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MongoDBConfig

        public MongoDBConfig​(java.lang.String sPath)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new MongoDBConfig by reading the specified properties file.
        参数:
        sPath - The path to the properties file containing MongoDB configuration.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the properties file.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMongoHostname

        public java.lang.String getMongoHostname()
        Retrieves the MongoDB hostname from the configuration.
        返回:
        The MongoDB hostname, defaults to "127.0.0.1" if not specified.

      • getMongoUsername

        public java.lang.String getMongoUsername()
        Retrieves the MongoDB username from the configuration.
        返回:
        The MongoDB username, defaults to "user" if not specified.

      • getMongoPassword

        public java.lang.String getMongoPassword()
        Retrieves the MongoDB password from the configuration.
        返回:
        The MongoDB password, defaults to "password" if not specified.

      • getMongoPort

        public int getMongoPort()
        Retrieves the MongoDB port from the configuration.
        返回:
        The MongoDB port as an integer, defaults to 27017 if not specified.

      • getMongoDatabase

        public java.lang.String getMongoDatabase()
        Retrieves the MongoDB database name from the configuration.
        返回:
        The MongoDB database name, defaults to "database" if not specified.

      • getMongoCollection

        public java.lang.String getMongoCollection()
        Retrieves the name of the MongoDB collection to connect to from the configuration.
        返回:
        The MongoDB collection name, defaults to "collection" if not specified.
